battleTraits.name: Euphoric Killers
battleTraits.lore: The followers of Slaanesh revel in slaughter, the thrill of battle sending them into an electrified frenzy as they mutilate their foe.
battleTraits.effect:
While a friendly unit has the **EUPHORIC** keyword:

• That unit’s weapons, including **Companion** weapons, have **Crit (2 Hits)**.
• That unit can use a ****RUN**** ability and still use ****SHOOT**** and/or ****CHARGE**** abilities later in the turn.

**Designer’s Note**: *Note that ‘Sadistic Spite’ does not affect **Companion** weapons.*

battleTraits.name: An Excess of Depravity
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: Wherever the Hedonites of Slaanesh roam, reality is unmade. Those who stand against them are assailed by titillating phantasms and mind-bending illusions until they become slaves to their own base urges.
battleTraits.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** units to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
The targets have the **EUPHORIC** keyword for the rest of the battle round.

In addition, for each friendly unit you pick, give your opponent 1 **temptation dice**. Your opponent can use 1 **temptation dice** to replace 1 wound roll, 1 save roll, 1 ward roll or 1 **run** roll for a unit in their army with a 6, or they can use 2 **temptation dice** to replace 2 of the dice in a **charge** roll for a unit in their army with two 6s.

Each time your opponent uses a **temptation dice**, they must roll it. On a 1-2, your opponent’s roll is replaced by that value instead of a 6, and you must allocate D3 damage points to the unit for which the roll was replaced immediately after the ability used by that unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

At the end of the battle round, any **temptation dice** that have not been used are lost.

regimentAbilities.abilityGroupName: Blades of the Lurid Dream Regiment Abilities
regimentAbilities.name: Unparalleled Speed
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: They say the first blow struck is the sweetest…
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit to use this ability.

regimentAbilities.abilityGroupName: Blades of the Lurid Dream Regiment Abilities
regimentAbilities.name: Locus of Diversion
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Movement Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: These warriors release perfumed mists that fill the foes’ minds with everything but the matter at hand.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit to use this ability.
regimentAbilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, that unit can use a ****RETREAT**** ability and still use ****SHOOT**** and/or ****CHARGE**** abilities later in the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Threnody Voicebox
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: When swallowed and held in the gullet, this tiny music box allows the bearer to let fly a mournful melody that can lull enemies into a stupor.
artefactsOfPower.effect: For the rest of the turn, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Icon of Infinite Excess
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: Slaanesh’s most opulent standard drives both followers and enemies of the Dark Prince into orgiastic fits of violence.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick a non-****HERO** HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Pendant of Slaanesh
artefactsOfPower.lore: This pendant burrows deep into the owner’s chest and nestles next to their heart, invigorating them whenever they feel pain.
artefactsOfPower.effect: If any damage points were allocated to this unit this turn, **Heal (3)** this unit.

spearheadEnhancements.abilityGroupName: Blades of the Lurid Dream Enhancements
spearheadEnhancements.name: Pendant of Slaanesh
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This pendant burrows through the Shardspeaker’s rich fabrics and scarred chest before nestling next to their heart, invigorating them with sublime energy whenever they feel pain.

spearheadEnhancements.abilityGroupName: Blades of the Lurid Dream Enhancements
spearheadEnhancements.name: Cacophonic Choir
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The Shardspeaker summons a sanity‑shattering symphony of sound.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 6+, make a **cacophony roll** of D6. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each enemy unit (roll for each) within 6" of your general that has a Control characteristic less than the cacophony roll.

spearheadEnhancements.abilityGroupName: Blades of the Lurid Dream Enhancements
spearheadEnhancements.name: Twisted Mirror
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Shooting Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: A Twisted Mirror tests the spirit of any who gaze into it, immobilising those who fall victim to its illusions.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 9" of your general and roll a dice.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 4+, subtract 1 from save rolls for that unit until the start of your next turn.

spearheadEnhancements.abilityGroupName: Blades of the Lurid Dream Enhancements
spearheadEnhancements.name: Sceptre of Domination
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The staff carried by this Shardspeaker contains magic that can seduce the minds of their foes.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Roll a dice for each enemy unit in combat with your general.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 5+, the unit being rolled for has **STRIKE‑LAST** this phase.

heroicTraits.name: Glory Hog
heroicTraits.lore: This hero wants nothing more than to revel in the defeat of their enemies.
heroicTraits.effect: If an enemy ****HERO**** is destroyed by this unit, this unit has the **EUPHORIC** keyword for the rest of the battle.

heroicTraits.name: Strongest Alone
heroicTraits.lore: This hero fights most fiercely on their own, lest their followers sully their greatness with their lesser presence.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s attacks while it is more than 6" from all other friendly units.

heroicTraits.name: Into the Fray
heroicTraits.lore: The first blow struck is the sweetest, and this warlord makes sure they slake their desire for violence with force and skill.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit charged this turn and the unmodified **charge** roll was 8+, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Sadistic Spite
abilities.lore: The caster bombards their allies with visions of their most visceral and bloody desires until they can no longer tell what is real and what is fantasy.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **EUPHORIC** unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target’s melee weapons have **Crit (Mortal)** instead of **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the battle round.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Acquiescence
abilities.lore: The wizard engulfs the foe in an arcane haze of dreams and unattainable desires.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks that target that enemy unit until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Phantasmagoria
abilities.lore: The sorcerer summons illusory creatures that flit across the battlefield, bewildering the enemy and enabling their allies to retreat.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target is picked to use a **FIGHT** ability, you can pick a friendly unit in combat with the target. That friendly unit can move 2D3" after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved. It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Summon Mesmerising Mirror
abilities.lore: Smashing a small glass mirror to the ground, the wizard uses magical energy to cause it to reform and grow in size.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Mesmerising Mirror** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Mesmerising Mirror** wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

abilities.name: Summon Wheels of Excruciation
abilities.lore: Throwing a small multi-bladed knife into the air and channelling magical energy into it, the caster summons forth a storm of swiftly moving razor-sharp blades.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Wheels of Excruciation** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Wheels of Excruciation** endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Dreadful Visage
abilities.lore: Inhaling draughts of hallucinogenic incense, the caster externalises their most unnatural desires in the form of a screaming daemonic visage.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Dreadful Visage** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Dreadful Visage** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: The Ecstatic Throngs
abilities.lore: To the massed supplicants of Slaanesh, any form of sensation – even the most agonising – is to be embraced as a sacrament to their loathsome god.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for friendly **SYBARITE INFANTRY** units while they are damaged or if they had any models slain in the same turn.

abilities.name: Exquisite Palate
abilities.lore: The Mortal Realms are vistas of depraved fascination to Slaanesh’s daemons, who will resist banishment with all their might.
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH DAEMON** uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

abilities.name: Godly Ambitions
abilities.lore: There are many who would now seek to supplant imprisoned Slaanesh, and their force of personality fills their worshippers with reverent mania.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly non‑**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** units while they are within the combat ranges of any friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH HEROES.**

abilities.name: Reckless Haste
abilities.lore: Whether seeking their lost god or simply chasing new heights of speed, the mounted hosts of Slaanesh make war at a breakneck pace.
abilities.effect: Friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH CAVALRY** units can use a **RETREAT** ability and still use **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH CAVALRY** units by **RETREAT** abilities.
